extDescription.message: Browser extension for tldw_server - your unified AI assistant with RAG, media processing, and more.

contextSaveToNotesNoSelection.message: Select text first to save to Notes.

contextSaveToNotesDeliveryFailed.message: Could not open the sidebar to save this note. Check that the tldw Assistant sidebar is allowed on this site and try again.

hfSendPageRejected.message: [tldw] Page send request rejected by tldw_server

hfSendPageErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server: $1. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageError.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageSuccess.message: [tldw] Sent page to tldw_server for processing

hfSendPageException.message: [tldw] Something went wrong while sending this page to tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

hfPullInProgress.message: [tldw Assistant] A model pull request is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before starting another one.

hfPullConfirm.message: [tldw Assistant] Do you want to send a request to your tldw_server to pull the "$1" model? This is independent of the huggingface.co website. Your server will start pulling the model after you confirm.

hfPullSending.message: [tldw Assistant] Sending a request to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Check the extension icon or your tldw_server logs for progress.

hfPullErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1": $2. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullError.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1". Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullSuccess.message: [tldw Assistant] Request sent to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Monitor the extension icon or tldw_server logs for status.

hfPullException.message: [tldw Assistant] Something went wrong while sending a pull request for "$1" to your tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

footerHelp.message: Once connected, you can revisit these settings anytime from the extension menu.
footerHelp.description: Onboarding footer help text in Settings.

progressAria.description: Aria label for onboarding progress indicator.

stepLabel.description: Label for the first onboarding step (welcome).

path.message: How would you like to get started?
path.description: Heading for choosing how to get started in onboarding.

authModeHelp.message: Single User (API Key) is recommended for personal or small-team servers. Multi User (Login) is for shared deployments where people sign in with usernames or SSO. Choose the mode that matches how your tldw_server is set up.
authModeHelp.description: Help text explaining Single User vs Multi User authentication modes.

apiKeyHelp.message: Find your API key in tldw_server → Settings → API Keys. Generate a key there and paste it here.
apiKeyHelp.description: Help text describing where to find the API key.

authStepAria.message: Step {{current}} of {{total}} — Choose how you sign in
authStepAria.description: Aria label for the authentication step in onboarding.

confirmStepAria.message: Step {{current}} of {{total}} — Confirm connection and review next steps
confirmStepAria.description: Aria label for the confirmation step in onboarding.

nextSteps.description: Title for the final onboarding panel describing next steps.

notesEmpty_connectDescription.message: To use Notes, first connect to your tldw server.

notesEmpty_connectExample1.message: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.

notesEmpty_connectExample2.message: Use Diagnostics if your server is running but not reachable.

notesEmpty_demoDescription.message: This demo shows how Notes can organize your insights. Connect your own server later to create and save real notes.

notesEmpty_demoExample1.message: See how note titles, previews, and timestamps appear in the list.

notesEmpty_demoExample2.message: When you connect, you’ll be able to create notes from meetings, reviews, and more.

notesEmpty_demoExample3.message: Use Notes alongside Media and Review to keep track of your findings.

notesEmpty_demoSample1Preview.message: Decisions, blockers, and follow-ups from a recent team sync.

notesEmpty_demoSample2Preview.message: Key insights pulled from a long article or paper.

notesEmpty_demoSample3Preview.message: Summary of a customer call with next steps and owners.

notesEmpty_description.message: Capture and organize free-form notes connected to your tldw insights.

notesEmpty_exampleCreate.message: Create a new note for a recent meeting or transcript.

notesEmpty_exampleLink.message: Save review outputs into Notes so you can revisit them later.

headerShortcuts.message: Show quick shortcuts in the header
headerShortcuts.description: Setting option to show quick shortcuts in the header during onboarding.

restartOnboardingLabel.description: Label for the setting that restarts the onboarding flow.

restartOnboardingButton.description: Button text to restart onboarding from Settings.

restartOnboardingConfirmTitle.description: Confirmation dialog title when restarting onboarding.

restartOnboardingConfirmMessage.message: This will reset your onboarding state and take you back to the setup flow.
restartOnboardingConfirmMessage.description: Confirmation dialog body explaining what restarting onboarding does.

enableOcrAssets_downloadNotice.message: Enabling OCR will download ~5MB of language data on first use

omniSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the omni-search input in the header.

omniSearchNoResults.description: No-results text for omni-search when nothing matches the query.

omniSearchCreateNote.description: Omni-search action label to create a note from the current query.

omniSearchCreateFlashcards.description: Omni-search action label to create a flashcard collection from the current query.

omniSearchStartChat.description: Omni-search action label to start a new chat from the current query.

connectionCard_connectedCaption.message: Chat and tools are now available in Options and the sidepanel.
connectionCard_connectedCaption.description: Caption under the server connection card when the extension is connected.

quickIngestQueuedAria.message: {{label}} — {{count}} items queued — click to review and process
quickIngestQueuedAria.description: ARIA label template for the Quick ingest button when there are queued items.

connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.description: First bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting media review.
Second bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting knowledge/notes search.

connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.message: Use RAG with your own documents
connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.description: Third bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting retrieval-augmented generation usage.

omniSearch_filterScreen.description: Filter label for screens in omni-search.

omniSearch_filterChat.description: Filter label for chats in omni-search.

omniSearch_filterMedia.description: Filter label for media in omni-search.

omniSearch_filterNote.description: Filter label for notes in omni-search.

omniSearch_filterFlashcards.description: Filter label for flashcard collections in omni-search.

omniSearch_filterPrompt.description: Filter label for prompts in omni-search.

omniSearch_filteringBy.description: Prefix label shown before the active omni-search filter type.

omniSearchCreateNoteSuccess.description: Confirmation toast message shown after creating a note from omni-search.

omniSearchCreateFlashcardsSuccess.description: Confirmation toast message shown after creating a flashcard collection from omni-search.

quickIngest_ocrHelp.message: OCR helps extract text from scanned PDFs or images.

specReloadedToastDiff.message: Advanced spec reloaded from server (fields added: {{added}}, removed: {{removed}})

specFallbackWarning.message: Using bundled media.add schema fallback (v{{version}}); please verify against your tldw_server /openapi.json if fields look outdated.

serverChatLoadError.message: Failed to load server chat. Check your connection and try again.

serverChatsUnavailableNotConnected.message: Server chats are available once you connect to your tldw server.

serverChatsUnavailableServerError.message: Server chats unavailable right now. Check your server logs or try again.

tools_fs_list.description: Label for the fs.list tool (list directory).

tools_fs_read.description: Label for the fs.read tool (read file).

tools_fs_write.description: Label for the fs.write tool (write file).

tools_fs_apply_patch.description: Label for the fs.apply_patch tool (apply patch).

tools_fs_mkdir.description: Label for the fs.mkdir tool (create directory).

tools_fs_delete.description: Label for the fs.delete tool (delete file or directory).

tools_search_grep.description: Label for the search.grep tool (search file contents).

tools_search_glob.description: Label for the search.glob tool (find files by pattern).

tools_git_add.description: Label for the git.add tool (stage files).

tools_exec_run.description: Label for the exec.run tool (run command).

serverChatForkedLabel.description: Label shown on chats that were forked from another server chat.

serverChatForkedTooltip.description: Tooltip explaining which original server chat this chat was forked from.

commandPalette_goToChat.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Chat screen.

commandPalette_goToMedia.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Media screen.

commandPalette_goToNotes.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Notes screen.

commandPalette_goToFlashcards.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Flashcards screen.

commandPalette_goToSettings.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Settings screen.

commandPalette_goToHealth.description: Command palette action label to open the Health & diagnostics screen.

commandPalette_newChat.description: Command palette action label to start a new chat.

commandPalette_toggleKnowledgeSearch.description: Command palette toggle label for enabling or disabling knowledge search.

commandPalette_toggleKnowledgeSearchDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the knowledge search toggle.

commandPalette_toggleWebSearch.description: Command palette toggle label for enabling or disabling web search.

commandPalette_toggleWebDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the web search toggle.

commandPalette_ingestPage.description: Command palette action label to ingest the current page into knowledge.

commandPalette_ingestDesc.message: Save this page to your knowledge base
commandPalette_ingestDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining page ingestion into knowledge.

commandPalette_switchModel.description: Command palette action label to switch the active chat/model.

commandPalette_toggleSidebar.description: Command palette toggle label to show or hide the sidepanel.

commandPalette_toggleSidebarDesc.message: Show or hide the chat sidebar
commandPalette_toggleSidebarDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the sidebar visibility toggle.

commandPalette_placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the command palette input.

commandPalette_noResults.description: No-results state text in the command palette when nothing matches the query.

commandPalette_title.description: Title of the command palette UI.

commandPalette_navigate.description: Command palette keyboard hint label for navigation.

commandPalette_select.description: Command palette keyboard hint label for selection.

commandPalette_toOpen.description: Command palette keyboard hint label indicating the shortcut to open an item.

commandPalette_categoryActions.description: Label for the Actions category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categoryNavigation.description: Label for the Navigation category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categorySettings.description: Label for the Settings category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categoryRecent.description: Label for the Recent items category in the command palette.

markdown_couldNotDisplay.message: The message content could not be displayed. This may be due to invalid formatting.

status_running.description: Status label for operations currently in progress.

modelSelect_label.description: Label for the model select dropdown.

modelSelect_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the model select dropdown.

featureHints_knowledge_description.message: Open the knowledge search panel to find snippets and insert them into your chat.
featureHints_knowledge_description.description: Description for the knowledge search feature hint.

featureHints_moreTools_title.description: Title for the more tools feature hint.

featureHints_moreTools_description.message: Access vision mode, image upload, quick ingest, and the full app.
featureHints_moreTools_description.description: Description for the more tools feature hint.

featureHints_commandPalette_description.description: Description for the command palette feature hint.

featureHints_modelSettings_description.message: Fine-tune temperature, context length, and other model settings.
featureHints_modelSettings_description.description: Description for the model settings feature hint.

chatSidebar_expand.description: Tooltip to expand the chat sidebar.

chatSidebar_search.description: Placeholder text for the chat sidebar search input.

chatSidebar_ingest.description: Label for the ingest page shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_media.description: Label for the Media tab shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_flashcards.description: Label for the Flashcards tab shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_prompts.description: Label for the Prompts tab shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_multiItem.description: Label for the multi-item tab shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_shortcuts.description: Label for the Shortcuts tab shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_settings.description: Label for the Settings shortcut in the sidebar.

chatSidebar_loadError.description: Error message shown when chat list loading fails.

error_friendlyApiKeySummary.message: We couldn't reach your tldw server.

error_friendlyApiKeyHint.message: Your API key may be invalid. Open Settings → tldw server to check your URL and API key, then try again.

error_friendlyTimeoutHint.message: The server stopped streaming responses. Try again, or open Health & diagnostics to check server status.

error_friendlyGenericSummary.message: Something went wrong while talking to your tldw server.

error_friendlyGenericHint.message: Try again in a moment, or open Health & diagnostics to inspect server health.
